Summary: witnessed a bright glowing (orange) disc shaped object hovering over the south bay area of Los Angeles.
divs: sighting detailswhen i was between the age of seven and 10 years old, my father and i were driving home from a movie. it was the late seventies and my father and i were wearing matching blue nylon vests that were popular back then. it had to be fall or winter then. as we drove home i noticed that the streets were empty of people and most of all activity. it wasnt that late maybe 8pm or 9pm so i thought it was odd. i mentioned this to my father, but he was oblivious. i noticed all the lights were on at the stores and homes but absolutely no people were around. no cars nobody walking. as we turned down our street, i noticed a huge orange object hovering about 500 feet or so off the ground and it was so large that i cant say how far away it was maybe 3-10 miles away. it was silent and just a bright orange glowing oval\disc shaped object. it was probably as big as a couple of football fields. i told my father, but he said it was just the moon. i then looked out the passenger window upwards and saw the moon overhead. i told him that the moon was up there and he looked up through the windshield of the car and saw it and then looked at the object again. he stopped the car and put it in park. he opened the door and stepped out to get a better look. i heard him make a sound of amazement as he stood staring at the object for a few minutes. this object made no noise, had no visible engines no real detail except for the orange glow it emmitted against the night sky. i looked like it was hovering over lax from where we were at. the next thing i remember was waking up in bed about 5 or 6 hours later fully clothed and my shoes on. i was still wearing the blue vest and all. i quickly rushed into my parents room only to find my father lying in bed fully clothed and in a deep sleep. i mentioned it to him the next morning and he didnt remember a thing. the car was parked in the front of the garage too. i asked my frieds in the neighborhood and at school, but nobody i talked to remembers seeing it. i figured it was a dream and in time i also had forgotten about the incident for many years. it wasnt until about 10 years ago that i remembered what had happend in better detail. i cant remember what year it was exactly, but around that time i remember suffering from chronic nose bleeds. i never had that problem when i was younger and it only lasted for a few years or so. i dont know if i was abducted, but i do remeber a dream i had as a child. in my dream at the time my father was looking at the object i noticed some movement to my right and looked out the window. i noticed about 10 people\humanoids peering behind trees and behind houses and they all just looked at us at the same time. they quickly started to approach the car. my father said something to them and thats the last thing i remember from my dream. i dont know if this mufon thing is on the up and up, but i havent had any other incidents since then nor do i remember anything else. i dont think i have any implants in me but then again i have never checked for any. i dont want some secret agency spying on me or taking me into some secret hangar to inspect me so i would like to stay anonymous as possible. i do believe in alien life and ufos visiting this planet or dimension. i hope that someone else who possibly remembers this incident will read this and write his\her experience on this site for others to read and come forward.
